assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Greenply Industries Limited, an interior infrastructure company, manufactures, markets, trades in, and distributes plywood and allied products in India and internationally. The company provides plywood and block boards, decorative veneers, flush doors, wood floors, and PVC foam boards and sheets. It markets its products through a network of distributors, dealers, and retailers. The company was formerly known as Mittal Laminates Private Limited and changed its name to Greenply Industries Limited in 1995. Greenply Industries Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
